title: Imbali emfutshane yoBugcisa esithubeni-iTempile ye-Orbital
heading: Imbali emfutshane yoBugcisa kwiSithuba
intro: Ukusukela oko kwasungulwa ngempumelelo isathelayithi eyenziweyo ngo -1957 , ngaphezulu kwamawaka alishumi eisathelayithi eza kujikeleza uMhlaba. Ngeli xesha elitsha, amagcisa afumene indlela yokwandisa ukusebenza kwawo kwaye indawo yangaphandle ibe luhlobo olutsha lweseyile. Ngaloo nto, imibuzo esisiseko malunga nezopolitiko zokuphononongwa kwendawo iye yavela - nangona umhlaba omninzi kusafuneka ugutyungelwe.

leonov.text: Umsebenzi wokuqala wobugcisa owenziwe esithubeni wawungumzobo wokuphuma kwelanga phezu koMhlaba, owenziwe ngusomajukujuku waseRashiya uAlexei Leonov ngelixa ekhwele iVoskhod 2 ngo- 1965 .
leonov.caption: Isiqwenga sokuqala sobugcisa esidalwe kwindawo, kunye neepensile u-Alexei Leonov wasebenzisa ukuzoba. Ifoto: Imyuziyam yeYuri Gagarin Cosmonaut Training Centre

moonMuseum.paragraph1: Kwiminyaka emithathu kamva, iMyuziyam yeNyanga , i-miniscule ceramic plate ebizwa ngokuba yi-miniscule ceramic plate ebhalwe ngamagcisa amathandathu abalaseleyo e-US ngelo xesha: Robert Rauschenberg , David Novros , John Chamberlain , Claes Oldenburg , Forrest Myers kunye noAndy Warhol .
moonMuseum.caption1: Umfanekiso weMyuziyam yeNyanga kwinqaku lokuqala leNew York Times. Ubhontsi uyawufihla umzobo kaWarhol.
moonMuseum.paragraph2: Igalelo likaWarhol elixhokonxayo - phezulu ekhohlo - lenze le projekthi yaba ngumngeni kumajelo onxibelelwano ngelo xesha.
moonMuseum.caption2: Umfanekiso weNew York Times wakhetha ukuwupapasha, kunye nomzobo obonakalayo ongezantsi kunye nomzobo kaAndy Warhol kwikona ephezulu ngasekhohlo.

fallenAstronaut.text: Ngomnyaka we-1971 , umfanekiso oqingqiweyo we-aluminium owenziwe nge-humanoid obizwa ngokuba yi -Fallen Astronaut wabekwa eNyangeni ngu-Apollo 15 usomajukujuku uDavid Scott . Umzobi waseBelgium uPaul Van Hoeydonck wayenenjongo, ngesi siqwenga, ukukhumbula oosomajukujuku kunye noosomajukujuku abasweleke ekuqhubeleni phambili kokuphononongwa kwendawo.
fallenAstronaut.caption: Imbonakalo yelitye lesikhumbuzo elishiywe enyangeni kwindawo yokumisa yaseHadley-Apennine.

pioneerVoyager.text: Ngeminyaka yee-1970 , zombini iiPioneer Plaques kunye neVoyager Probes zaseka ihorizons entsha yobugcisa esithubeni. Bephethe amacwecwe e-aluminiyam enziwe ngegolide anemiyalezo ebonakalayo evela eMhlabeni isiya nakwesiphi na esinye isiphekepheke esinokuzifumana kwixesha elizayo elikude, babonisa ubomi bomntu kwezona zinto zibalulekileyo.
pioneerVoyager.caption: Amacwecwe e-Pioneer 10 kunye ne-11, athwalwa kwindawo enzulu ngeminyaka yee-1970.

dove.text: Ngomnyaka we-1990 , iBrazil yashiya uphawu lwayo kulo mmandla nge -DOVE/OSCAR-17 , isathelayithi ekrelekrele ye-amateur yamandla amakhulu ombongo. Nangona umyili wayo engazigqali njengegcisa, yayingumzamo onzulu wobubongo: yarekhoda amazwi abantwana becela uxolo kwaye iwadlulisele kubantu abangabaziyo bakanomathotholo abangaphezu kwamawaka amabini kwihlabathi liphela, iguqula iCubeSat yobuvulindlela ibe ngumsebenzi wesandi esihlangeneyo.
dove.caption: I-DOVE/OSCAR-17, isathelayithi yombongo yaseBrazil ehambisa amazwi oxolo abantwana, ngowe-1990.

lastPictures.text: Kwi -2012 , umculi uTrevor Paglen uqalise "Imifanekiso yokugqibela" , i-micro-etched disc eneefoto ze-100 ezifakwe kwi-satellite yonxibelelwano ye-Echostar XVI kwi-geostationary orbit. Idizayinelwe ukuba ihlale iibhiliyoni zeminyaka, yenzelwe ukuba idlule impucuko yabantu njengezinto zakudala zakudala kwikamva elikude.
lastPictures.caption: IMifanekiso yokuGqibela, idiskhi ene-micro-etched eyenzelwe ukodlula uluntu, yasungulwa ngo-2012.

ulises.text: Kwi -2015 , i -Colectivo Espacial Mexicano (i-Mexican Space Collective) iqalise i-Ulises I , i-nanosatellite ekhulelwe njenge-opera yombono phantsi kolawulo lomculi uJuan José Díaz Infante Casasús . Isathelayithi yathwalwa kwistratosphere kwibhaluni ngexesha leFeria del Libro de Guadalajara. Yenzelwe ukudubula malunga neeyure ezine kwaye yehle ngeparashute.
ulises.caption: Ulises I, ingqikelelo yeopera yesathelayithi nguColectivo Espacial Mexicano.

artsat.text: Akuzange kube ngo -2014 apho i-satellite yokuqala yobugcisa yasungulwa. Iprojekthi ye -ARTSAT-1 yeYunivesithi yaseTokyo ye-ARTSAT-1 ithumele idatha yendawo kuMhlaba eyayisetyenziswa kufakelo lobugcisa kunye nokudalwa komculo.
artsat.caption1: Isakhelo somhlaseli we-ARTSAT-1 kunye neendawo ezishiyekileyo ezishiyekileyo emhlabeni.
artsat.caption2: injongo [SPACE x ART] − ngaphaya komboniso weCosmologies obubanjelwe kwiMyuziyam yeContemporary Art Tokyo

kac.text: Umzobi waseBrazil nowaseMelika u-Eduardo Kac uye wanegalelo kubugcisa bendawo ngokusebenzisana neNASA kunye ne-SpaceX . Yakhe "Inner Telescope" ( 2017 ), eyakhiwe kunye ne-astronaut yaseFransi uThomas Pesquet , yabangela ukuba umfanekiso owenziwe kwi- International Space Station .
kac.caption: I-Inner Telescope kwiSikhululo saseMajukujukwini saMazwe ngaMazwe, esenziwe nosomajukujuku waseFransi uThomas Pesquet, ngo-2017.

enoch.text: Ngo -2018 , i-CubeSat esebenzayo eyakhiwe njengeprojekthi yobugcisa yasungulwa kwi-orbit. Iphuhliswe ngumculi we-bahamian we-conceptual u-Tavares Strachan , u-Enoki uqulethe i-24-karat-gold canopic jar kunye ne-bust of the first African-American astronaut, Robert Henry Lawrence Jr.
enoch.caption: I-ENOCH (iyunithi yokubonisa), i-2015-2017. ⓒ ITavares Strachan, ifoto ⓒ IziNcedisi zeMyuziyam/LACMA.

orbitalReflector.text: Kwangaloo nyaka, i-Orbital Reflector kaTrevor Paglen nayo yasungulwa njengomfanekiso oqingqiweyo ogcinwe kwiCubeSat engasebenziyo. Umsebenzi wawusisenzo sobugcisa esijoliswe ukutshintsha indlela esiyibona ngayo indawo yethu ehlabathini. Ayizange isetyenziswe ngokuchanekileyo. Nangona ingazange ivuleke ngendlela eyilelwe ngayo, iye yavusa iincoko ezibalulekileyo yaza yafumana iimpendulo ezishushu kwizazi ngeenkwenkwezi, izazinzulu, amaziko eendaba, abafundisi-ntsapho, abafundi, noluntu ngokubanzi kwihlabathi jikelele, nto leyo ebonisa ukuba ubugcisa obuphumelelayo abuyomfuneko ukuba bube nempumelelo.
orbitalReflector.caption: Unikezelo lweDijithali ye-Orbital Reflector, ngo-2018

others.text: Amanye amagcisa amaninzi abe negalelo kummandla wobugcisa basemajukujukwini, ngalinye lizisa iimbono ezizodwa kuphando lwalo. Iiprojekthi eziphawulekayo ziquka uphando lwengcali ye-astronaut kaSarah Jane Pell ehlola ukusebenza komntu kwiindawo ezingqongileyo ezigqithisileyo; Iprojekthi ye -Analogue yeNyanga yeNyanga ka-Agnes Meyer-Brandis ephonononga amabali ophononongo lwembali kunye nexesha langoku; Inkqubo ye -AstroArts kaNahum iququzelela imifuniselo yobugcisa bemicrogravity; kunye nomfanekiso oqingqiweyo ka-Arthur Woods weCosmic Dancer , umfanekiso oqingqiweyo wokuqala owaboniswa emajukujukwini kwisikhululo saseMir ngo-1993.

orbitalTemple.text: Kwi -2025 , emva kweminyaka eyi-4 yophando kunye nophuhliso, umculi waseBrazil u-Edson Pavoni kunye neqela le-multidisciplinary yabadibanisi baya kuqalisa i-Orbital Temple , isathelayithi yobugcisa ethatha inxaxheba ecela nabani na ehlabathini ukuba bathumele amagama kwi-orbit, ukudala isikhumbuzo esipheleleyo esibandakanya ngaphaya kwemida.
orbitalTemple.caption: Itempile ye-Orbital kwi-Mercosul Bienal. Ifoto: Clara Marques

imageAlts.moonMuseumWarhol: Iwafer yeceramic yeNyanga ebonisa yonke imisebenzi yobugcisa
